title: COGS 108 – Final Project: What Drives Cancer Severity?
description: Collaborated on analyzing a real-world social or economic issue using real datasets. Utilized Python (pandas, scikit-learn) for data cleaning, feature engineering, and logistic regression. Created data visualizations to communicate key insights and findings effectively.

title: Business Analytics Capstone
description: Collaborated in a team to perform A/B testing and K-means clustering on company and industry data. Built interactive Excel dashboards and delivered consultant-style recommendations to improve strategy.

title: DSC106 Project 1
description: Course project exploring interactive visualization design and evaluation; implemented a small app and wrote a brief design rationale.

title: DSC106 Lab 1
description: Hands-on lab practicing HTML/CSS fundamentals and layout techniques; produced a simple, accessible page.

title: DSC106 Lab 2
description: Built a responsive projects grid with CSS Grid, styled navigation with hover accents, and created a clean contact form layout.

title: DSC106 Lab 3
description: Added a theme switcher (automatic/light/dark) with persistence via localStorage and generated a shared navigation menu via JavaScript.

title: DOC Research Paper
description: Authored an academic research paper: literature review, argument structure, and evidence-based analysis with proper citation.

title: DSC10 Final Project
description: Intro data science capstone using Python and pandas; performed exploratory data analysis and communicated results clearly.

title: DSC20 Final Project
description: Intermediate programming/data structures project; implemented algorithms, wrote tests, and profiled performance.

title: MGT 160 Experiment Research
description: Designed and conducted an experiment; collected data, performed statistical analysis, and summarized findings and implications.
